block.name: Tun/Tap Interface
block.doc:
A layer 3 to layer 2 Interface.
Gets a payload from a Layer 3 operating system, generates the corresponding event, and puts it into the Layer 2 queue. Gets an event from a Layer 2 input queue, extracts the payload, and puts it into the Layer 2 event queue. Uses the TUN/TAP Interface Use the Universal TUN/TAP device driver to move packets to/from kernel See /usr/src/linux/Documentation/networking/tuntap.txt
